display_information.name: Elahni Real Estate Bot
display_information.description: Searches for Location 2 commercial spaces in West Village & Tribeca
display_information.long_description: This bot searches commercial real estate listings on LoopNet, Crexi, and other platforms to find spaces matching Elahni's criteria for a second location. It looks for retail/commercial spaces under 2000 sq ft with high ceilings, ventilation potential, and basement access in West Village and Tribeca.
